what_to_know: Here's what you need to know today
about_shv_energy_1st: SHV Energy is a global leader in the distribution of off-grid energy solutions, including liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and small-scale liquefied natural gas (LNG). The company is also actively engaged in the development and deployment of sustainable fuels and renewable energy technologies.
about_shv_energy_2nd: Serving over 26 million residential and commercial customers worldwide, SHV Energy delivers decentralized, cleaner, and lower-carbon energy solutions. Its operations span 21 countries across 4 continents, supported by a workforce of 13,000 employees.
Policy_heading: Petromax Dealer Application values your privacy. When you use our app
use_3: Maintain secure access to the system

service_4: You won’t use the app for illegal purposes
